Package org.goobi.production.flow.statistics

##### THIS IS THE TEMPLATE FOR THE PACKAGE DOC COMMENTS.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDataSource
    This interface defines some general dataset for all future kind of statistical questions
    IStatisticalQuestion
    This interface defines the required methods for any implementations of statistical requests to be used with the StatisticalManager.
    IStatisticalQuestionLimitedTimeframe
    Extension of IStatisticalQuestion.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    StatisticsManager
    The Class StatisticsManager organizes all statistical questions by choosing the right implementation depening on StatisticsMode for old statistical question there will be generated jfreechart-datasets
    StatisticsRenderingElement  
    StepInformation
